messages.1000094967: Summons the hands of the dead to attack enemies. Attack up to 4 times by using the regular attack button.\n#yDark Magic\nDamage: {0}%
messages.1000094968:
Press the regular attack button during #yFeather Step#w to throw a large thorn. Little thorns grow from the large thorn, dealing additional damage to enemies.
#yDark Magic
Damage: {0}%
Can use Skeletal Distraction during this skill
messages.1000094994:
A claw attacks enemies 3 times, with a chance to Stun enemies on the last attack. 
#yDark Magic
Damage: {0}%
Additional Stun Chance: {1}%
messages.1000094970:
Use this skill or press the regular attack button while in the air to summon a claw to attack enemies on the ground 4 times.
#yDark Magic
Damage per Projectile: {0}%
Range: {1}m
messages.1000094971: Use this skill or press the special attack button after you've landed from #yPhantom Claw, Rampage Claw, Phantom Rage, or Blitz Claw#w to summon a claw to launch enemies. \n#yDark Magic\nDamage: {0}%
messages.1000094972:
Use this skill or jump during #yFeather Step#w to summon a claw to damage enemies in front. You'll evade backwards. Afterwards, you can perform #yGhostly Kick or Phantom Rage#w while airborne. 
#yDark Magic
Damage: {0}%
Damage reduced to {2}% after target takes {1} hits
Invincible when you jump
messages.1000094973:
Creates an area of unholy ground in front of you, damaging enemies every 2 seconds.
#yDark Magic
Damage per Attack: {0}%
Duration: {1} sec
messages.1000094974: Creates an area where the dead reign 4m in front of you. The dead drag enemies into the area and explode, dealing damage.\n#yDark Magic\nDamage: {0}%
messages.1000094975: Increases damage at the cost of HP. Use the skill again to turn it off. The skill ends when you reach 1 HP or lower. \n#yDamage Boost: {0}%\nDrains {1} HP every 2 seconds
messages.1000094976:
Allows the dead to possess you, making you invulnerable and increasing movement speed. Nearby enemies will take damage.
#yDark Magic

messages.1000094996:
저주의 부적을 던져 피격된 대상을 #y[낙인]#w된 상태로 만든다. 
이후 특정 스킬에 의한 공격은 자동으로 #y[낙인]#w된 대상의 위치로 발사된다. 
#y암흑속성

공격후 [일반공격] 입력시 추가부적 {2}% 데미지
사거리 {3}m
messages.1000094978:
Use this skill or press the special attack button during #yFeather Step#w to shoot a charm of webs that #yDelays#w enemies. If enemies afflicted with #yStigma#w are nearby, you can use additional charms equal to the number of #yStigmatized#w enemies.
#yDark Magic
Damage: {0}%
Delay Effect: Slows Action Speed by {1}%. Action Speed returns to normal over {2} sec
Range: {3}m
Can use Skeletal Distraction while casting this skill.
messages.1000096241: Summons an ominous doll. Only active near enemies and increases the amount of damage that all enemies take. The doll's durability weakens and when depleted, the doll is destroyed.\n#yDamage Taken by Enemies: +{0}%\nIncreases damage taken every {1} sec and durability reduces by {2}%

messages.1000094977:
Afflicts an enemy with #yStigma#w. Certain skills will then automatically aim toward that enemy. When a #yStigmatized#w enemy paralyzes you or knocks you back, their #yStigma#w will be cleansed. Use the skill again to remove the #yStigma#w (this does not apply to summoner's attacks).
#yDark Magic

Duration: {1} sec 
Range: {2}m
